title: LGBTQ and African American rights comparison

content.prompt: The activism for lesbian and gay rights most closely mirrored the activism for African American civil rights in that both groups

choices.label: gained widespread political support for their causes
accepted the moral values of their parents' generation
used public protests to call for legal protections

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
